com.owon.uppersoft.dso.source.usb

Class USBSourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.owon.uppersoft.dso.source.usb.USBSourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    USBDelegate, ICommunicateManager, IDeviceCreator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    USBSourceManagerTiny

    public class USBSourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommunicateManager, IDeviceCreator, USBDelegate
    管理USB数据源的状态和开启，提供USB数据源

        Description copied from interface: ICommunicateManager
